name: Corral
description: Corral is a game that has the player catch a horse in a corral. The player controls the cowboy and each turn can move him between 1 and 5 steps closer to the horse. The horse will bolt if the separation is more than halved or when reaching the bounds of the corral. Within 2 steps from the horse the horse may kick the cowboy.
alsoFor: Apple II, Commodore PET/CBM, Ohio Scientific, TRS-80 | Combined View
